title: Kaziranga: main stronghold of the Indian rhino
brief_description: The Kaziranga Game Reserve in Assam India. Shows elephants working and wild but concentrates on the endangered Indian rhinoceros including the capture of a young Indian rhinoceros for transportation to a zoo. Commentary by Frank Phillips.
